doc.content:
Animals Missing in Professor Assan and his Amazing Animals
Some animals keep disappearing in the circus. Equally mysterious, some animals come from nowhere. Maybe that's because some of them got sick and Professor Assan had to buy some animals back!?
01/03/2003 Professor Assan imported 4 chimps from Uganda;
01/12/2003 5 chimps, 2 pythons, 4 lions, 4 tigers, 2 elephants, 8 parrots are missed in the circus from Zambia to Tanzania.
01/12/2003 Professor Assan imported 4 extra lions, 4 tigers, 6 dogs from Tanzania.
